subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Fordham punter Benjamin Dato and linebacker Earl Hudnell, both seniors, were named Football Championship Subdivision All-Americans by the Sports Network. Dato was named to the first team and Hudnell was an honorable mention.
snippet: Fordham punter Benjamin Dato and linebacker Earl Hudnell, both seniors, were named Football Championship Subdivision All-Americans by the Sports Network. Dato was named to the first team and Hudnell was an honorable mention.
